abstract: Study in The Journal of the American College of Cardiology suggests HPV may increase chances of heart disease by suppressing an important gene.
snippet: Women infected with HPV are two to three times as likely as uninfected women to have had a heart attack or stroke, a new report says.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Journal of the American College of Cardiology

lead_paragraph: Women infected with HPV are two to three times as likely as uninfected women to have had a heart attack or stroke, a new report says.

headline.main: Troubles With Heart Are Linked to HPV
headline.print_headline: Troubles With Heart Are Linked To HPV
headline.seo: HPV Is Linked to Heart Disease in Women
